name: Sightless (Ghotiol)
description:
you are blind, but not deaf. shoot enemies and stay alive by watching the ripples they form when moving. Memory and observance are key!

made for the WWU 48 hour spring game jam

theme: sightless

Controls:

move with the mouse, click and drag to draw back your shots, and release to fire. the farther you draw back, the larger your projectile becomes. This game plays surprisingly well with a drawing tablet if you've got one.

Known bugs:

occasionally splashes do not appear on certain enemy deaths.
